member.summary: Gets the internal integer value representation of this keyframe mode.

member.name: P:FM.LiveSwitch.Vpx.KeyframeMode.Fixed
member.summary: Gets a KeyframeMode of type Fixed. This is deprecated by VPX and is equivalent to KeyframeMode.Disabled. To generate keyframes at fixed intervals, set the EncoderConfig.KeyframeMinDistance = EncoderConfig.KeyframeMaxDistance.

member.summary: Gets a KeyframeMode of type Auto.

member.summary: Gets a KeyframeMode of type Disabled.
